item.description:
** Update **

I'm moving the meeting to Sunday rather than Monday, in the hope that more people can attend. Since we're changing restaurants as well, I figured why not go the full monty. If people don't like this new date, we can switch back next month.

** Update #2 **

We're meeting at Joe's American Bar & Grill, on Dartmouth just north of the Copley T stop. When you get to Joe's, ask for the Libertarian Meetup group.

See you all this weekend!

group.name: The Boston Area Libertarian Meetup Group

item.name: The Boston Area Libertarian April Meeting
